projects.title: Task Manager
projects.firstParagraph: Team-oriented task manager application, ideal to organize projects, assing responsabilities and make project follow-up.
projects.secondParagraph: Inspired by Kanban-style workflows, this system can be adapted to businesses that need real-time task tracking and team collaboration.
projects.cta: Do you need a system to organize teams or tasks in your business?

projects.title: Eva DB - Institutional Management System
projects.firstParagraph: Eva DB is a comprehensive web-based management system developed for institutional environments. It allows authorized staff to manage users, internal records, and workflows from a centralized platform, improving organization, traceability, and internal communication.
projects.secondParagraph: The system was developed in collaboration with a public hospital, addressing real-world requirements such as access control, data integrity, and role-based permissions.
projects.thirdParagraph: Built with a scalable architecture and REST-based communication, the system can be adapted to different types of institutions or businesses with complex internal processes.
projects.cta: Do you need a custom internal system for your organization or institution?

projects.title: X-Clone - Social Platform Prototype
projects.firstParagraph: X-Clone is an interactive web platform focused on user-generated content and real-time interaction. The application includes user authentication, profiles, content publishing, and dynamic updates, providing a solid foundation for social or community-driven platforms.
projects.secondParagraph: Built using the Laravel TALL stack, the system demonstrates how modern web applications can deliver fast, responsive user experiences without sacrificing maintainability.
projects.thirdParagraph: This type of platform can be adapted to communities, internal company networks, or custom social applications.
projects.cta: This architecture can be adapted to platforms that require user interaction and content publishing.

projects.title: Profile Picture Uploader
projects.firstParagraph: Simple but strong application made to upload an image as your profile picture which then can be used or downloaded by other users.
projects.thirdParagraph: It's perhaps my most complete application yet. Includes Backend API in Laravel and Frontend in React. Implements Google OAuth, Sanctum Authentication with API tokens, Email sending, Query Caching with TanStack (React Query), Cloud Storage, and so on.
projects.cta: I can develop a system to store all your files in one click

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.firstParagraph: My personal portfolio, a simple web page I built to showcase who I am, my skills, and my projects.
projects.cta: I can make your own personal or businnes portfolio too!
